name: Gravity Bound Demo
description:
Gravity Bound is a future mobile game currently in development.

In this challenging platformer, you need to bounce your way to freedom by evading the dark matter obstacles and completing all the levels!

Storyline:

You're bound by gravity and the forces of Dark Matter have set out to destroy you.

You're trapped inside a simulation and the only way to free yourself is to evade the forces of Dark Matter.

Can you complete the simulation and become the master of gravity?

Controls:

PC:

Left Arrow: Move left

Right Arrow: Move right

Space: Restart

Mouse: UI navigation

Mobile:

Tap left part of screen: Move left

Tap right part of screen: Move right

Disclaimer:

***This demo only includes the first 10 levels and a tutorial, may still have some small glitches and bugs and has not yet been fully optimised.
